Holy living in which are described the means and instruments of obtaining every virute, and the remedies against every vice, and considerations serving to the resisting all temptations : together with prayers containing the whole duty of a Christian, and the parts of devotion occasians [sic], and furnished for all necessities / by Jer. Taylor. Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.
The 5th edition corrected, with additionals.
[18], 439 p.
Printed for Richard Royston, London : 1656.
Reproduction of original in: New College (University of Edinburgh). Library.
